idea:
Our Vision:
Every house clean, makes the country clean.

XchangeOnline â€¦reuse the refused

With an inspiring thought of serving our country by standardization of waste management, a Pune based Startup, Aloite Technologies Pvt. Ltd. developed XchangeOnline.in.
XchangeOnline is an online platform that helps to bridge the gap between consumers and the waste recyclers. With XO, every consumer, in an easy and relaxed way can either recycle or donate any unused goods or items. Thus, helping consumers in house clearance. No more accumulation of waste, carrying scrap from your home to a scrap vendor, no more dumping grounds, and unhygienic recycling. And bonus! Get rewarded and help in protecting the environment.
E-waste, newspaper, stationery, cartons, iron, wood, clothing, furniture, glass bottles, plastic bottles, cosmetics, etc. constitute household waste, we got it all covered.
name: ALOITE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The Concept of Printed Chairs is a new innovation and uses digital technology that allows for short run customised printing of furniture product designs. Further we have perfected the technology of ZipOn-ZipOff mesh backsw that can be changed by end users themselves. The approach allows for products to be used for longer duration without needing to throw products away due to soiled fabrics ande meshes failure. This is a world first innovation that is made in India and is being appreciated across the world. We can make chairs with logos and design elements for each of our customers or organisations. This is a new approach that will use customisation and personalisation of furniture that the world will follow in the future!! We already have patents of our chair which allows for back covers to be changed.
name: WORLDTAG INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The company has designed and developed a universal accessory (attachment) for
mobile phones. This accessory fits on the torch of any make of mobile (Smartphones) and advances the light
quality, focus quality and covers longer distance than standard mobile torch.

Batteries release harmful metals such as
mercury, lead and cadmium into the environment causing soil contamination
and water pollution. The incineration of batteries can also cause air
pollution. Battery waste can endanger wildlife and is potentially hazardous to
humans.
name: SONAL STRIDE IMPACT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Eveh is changing the future of mobility in India. Eveh is aiming to redefine transportation with its smart - connected - electric transportation solutions for individuals and businesses. Eveh's electric rides are affordable, smart, intelligent and efficient. Ridesharing has already begun to better people's lives. now, Eveh's smart electric vehicles will improve society by making streets safer, cities healthier and traffic a thing of the past. Eveh offers on demand and scheduled smart shared electric mobility solutions which will redefine the future of mobility. Why own when you can simply Eveh. We want you to experience our smart mobility solutions today. Let's change the future of transportation together!
name: EVEH MOBILITY PRIVATE LIMITED
